channel.title: Steam release fun
channel.description:
Well, i'm starting up the game and see the magic - zero shadows and interesting text. It seems that everyone with steam language different from english gets this text issue. Money well spent
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/535144504892976501/E982F4B5B7E8687C29922408DC14A0CA13447139/[/img]
]status

item.title: Steam release fun
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Well, it’s a temporary solution at least. Thanks for finding that so we can tell people how to fix it. We’ll keep working to resolve this.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam release fun
item.dc:creator: MAXGEAR
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

To fix the language thing, try adding -language english to the launch options. Our font currently does not support other character sets.

The fullbright occurs because mat_hdr_level is not 2, or dxlevel is below 9. Try starting up the game with -dxlevel 95, and then setting mat_hdr_level 2 in the console. We are looking into both issues as we speak.

DirectX and hdr level change helped against lack of shading, but language change did not has effect. Although steam language change helped with this problem. Maybe because application have not language selection at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Steam release fun
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
To fix the language thing, try adding -language english to the launch options. Our font currently does not support other character sets.

The fullbright occurs because mat_hdr_level is not 2, or dxlevel is below 9. Try starting up the game with -dxlevel 95, and then setting mat_hdr_level 2 in the console. We are looking into both issues as we speak.
